TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataBinder extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对应用程序快速开发 (RAD) 设计器的支持以生成和分析数据绑定表达式语法。

span.span: Provides support for rapid application development (RAD) designers to generate and parse data-binding expression syntax.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用重载的静态ASP.NET 网页中的数据绑定语法中此类的方法。You can use the overloaded static method of this class in data-binding syntax in an ASP.NET Web page. 这提供了语法更容易使用的工作量要比标准数据绑定。This provides an easier syntax to work with than standard data binding. 但是，因为`DataBinder.Eval`提供自动类型转换，它可以在导致性能降低。However, because `DataBinder.Eval` provides automatic type conversion, it can result in slower performance. 有关 ASP.NET 数据绑定、 表达式和语法的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)和[数据绑定表达式概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information about ASP.NET data binding, expressions, and syntax, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 从.NET Framework 4.5 开始，你可以使用模型绑定来简化的一些任务你具有的用于执行在早期版本中的数据绑定。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data). ## Examples 下面的示例使用静态方法以填充的字段控制使用的`Product`对象。The following example uses the static method to populate the fields of a control using an of `Product` objects. 方法无法应用相同的语法，但不是将快地执行。The method could be applied with the same syntax, but it would not perform as quickly. 此示例使用自定义`Product`类公开一个字符串`Model`属性和数字`UnitPrice`属性。This example uses a custom `Product` class which exposes a string `Model` property and a numeric `UnitPrice` property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是自定义`Product`类。The following code is the custom `Product` class. 应在单独的类文件在 App_Code 目录中，如 Product.cs 或 Product.vb 包含此代码。This code should be included in a separate class file in the App_Code directory, such as Product.cs or Product.vb. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/CS/App_Code/Product.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/VB/App_Code/Product.vb#2)]

Public Shared Property EnableCaching As Boolean

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在运行时是否启用了数据缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data caching is enabled at run time.

value.span: 如果为 类启用了缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if caching is enabled for the class; otherwise, .

summary.span: 在运行时使用反射来分析和计算对象的数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Uses reflection to parse and evaluate a data-binding expression against an object at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从.NET Framework 4.5 开始，你可以使用模型绑定来简化的一些任务你具有的用于执行在早期版本中的数据绑定。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Eval (object container, string expression);
.method public static hidebysig object Eval(object container, string expression) cil managed
Public Shared Function Eval (container As Object, expression As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ Eval(System::Object ^ container, System::String ^ expression);

param.name: container
param.span: 表达式根据其进行计算的对象引用。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 此标识符必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: expression
param.span: 从 container 对象到要放置在绑定控件属性中的公共属性值的导航路径。

span.span: The navigation path from the container object to the public property value to be placed in the bound control property.

param.span: 此路径必须是以点分隔的属性或字段名称字符串，如 C# 中的 Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price 或 Visual Basic 中的 Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price。

span.span: This must be a string of property or field names separated by periods, such as Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price in C# or Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price in Visual Basic.

summary.span: 在运行时计算数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Evaluates data-binding expressions at run time.

returns.span: 实例，它是数据绑定表达式的计算结果。

span.span: An instance that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`expression`参数的计算结果必须为公共属性。The value of the `expression` parameter must evaluate to a public property. 快速应用程序开发 (RAD) 如 Visual Studio 的设计器中创建数据绑定时，会自动调用此方法。This method is automatically called when you create data bindings in a rapid application development (RAD) designer such as Visual Studio. 你还可用于它以声明方式简化强制转换为文本字符串。You can also use it declaratively to simplify casting to a text string. 若要执行此操作，请使用`<%# %>`表达式语法，如标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定中使用。To do so, you use the `<%# %>` expression syntax, as used in standard ASP.NET data binding. 数据绑定到模板列表中的控件时，此方法是特别有用。This method is particularly useful when binding data to controls that are in a templated list. > [!NOTE] > 由于此方法中执行后期绑定评估，使用反射在运行时，它会导致性能明显下降比较为标准的 ASP.NET 数据绑定语法。Because this method performs late-bound evaluation, using reflection at run time, it can cause performance to noticeably slow compared to standard ASP.NET data-binding syntax. 列表的任何 Web 控件，如， ， ，或，`container`应`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list Web controls, such as , , , or , `container` should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果你正在绑定页上，针对`container`应`Page`。If you are binding against the page, `container` should be `Page`. 从.NET Framework 4.5 开始，你可以使用模型绑定来简化的一些任务你具有的用于执行在早期版本中的数据绑定。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`Eval`方法以将数据绑定到控件。The following examples show how to use the `Eval` method to bind data to control. 它需要一个名为产品的数据类。It requires a data class named Product. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/product.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/product.vb#1)] 代码隐藏文件加载测试数据并将绑定到该数据控件。The code-behind file loads test data and binds that data to a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts.aspx.vb#2)] 中的声明性语法控件时，使用方法替换`Container.DataItem`为`container`参数。In the declarative syntax for the control, you use the method with `Container.DataItem` for the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts3.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts3.aspx#3)] 也可以调用`Eval`函数并不包括`container`参数。Or, you can call `Eval` function and not include the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts4.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts4.aspx#4)]

exception.span: 为 或修整后变成空字符串。

span.span: is or is an empty string after trimming.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Eval (object container, string expression, string format);
.method public static hidebysig string Eval(object container, string expression, string format) cil managed
Public Shared Function Eval (container As Object, expression As String, format As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ Eval(System::Object ^ container, System::String ^ expression, System::String ^ format);

param.name: container
param.span: 表达式根据其进行计算的对象引用。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 此标识符必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: expression
param.span: 从 container 对象到要放置在绑定控件属性中的公共属性值的导航路径。

span.span: The navigation path from the container object to the public property value to be placed in the bound control property.

param.span: 此路径必须是以点分隔的属性或字段名称字符串，如 C# 中的 Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price 或 Visual Basic 中的 Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price。

span.span: This must be a string of property or field names separated by periods, such as Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price in C# or Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price in Visual Basic.

param.name: format
param.span: .NET Framework 格式字符串（如 使用的字符串），它将数据绑定表达式返回的 实例转换为 对象。

span.span: A .NET Framework format string (like those used by ) that converts the instance returned by the data-binding expression to a object.

summary.span: 在运行时计算数据绑定表达式，并将结果的格式设置为字符串。

span.span: Evaluates data-binding expressions at run time and formats the result as a string.

returns.span: 对象，它是计算数据绑定表达式和向字符串类型转换的结果。

span.span: A object that results from evaluating the data-binding expression and converting it to a string type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`expression`计算结果必须为公共属性。The value of `expression` must evaluate to a public property. 有关.NET Framework 中的格式字符串的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about format strings in the .NET Framework, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 快速应用程序开发 (RAD) 如 Visual Studio 的设计器中创建数据绑定时，会自动调用此方法。This method is automatically called when you create data bindings in a rapid application development (RAD) designer such as Visual Studio. 你可以还使用它以声明方式将转换导致的数据绑定表达式。You can also use it declaratively to convert the resulting from the data-binding expression to a . 若要以声明方式使用该方法，使用`<%# %>`表达式语法，如标准 ASP.NET 数据绑定中使用。To use the method declaratively, use the `<%# %>` expression syntax, as used in standard ASP.NET data binding. 数据绑定到模板列表中的控件时，此方法是特别有用。This method is particularly useful when binding data to controls that are in a templated list. > [!NOTE] > 由于此方法中执行后期绑定评估，使用反射在运行时，它会导致性能明显下降比较为标准的 ASP.NET 数据绑定语法。Because this method performs late-bound evaluation, using reflection at run time, it can cause performance to noticeably slow compared to standard ASP.NET data-binding syntax. 请慎用此方法，尤其是在字符串格式设置不需要时。Use this method judiciously, particularly when string formatting is not required. 列表的任何 Web 控件，如， ， ，或，`container`应`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list Web controls, such as , , , or , `container` should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果你正在绑定页上，针对`container`应`Page`。If you are binding against the page, `container` should be `Page`. 从.NET Framework 4.5 开始，你可以使用模型绑定来简化的一些任务你具有的用于执行在早期版本中的数据绑定。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`Eval`方法以将数据绑定到控件。The following examples show how to use the `Eval` method to bind data to control. 它需要一个名为产品的数据类。It requires a data class named Product. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/product.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/product.vb#1)] 代码隐藏文件加载测试数据并将绑定到该数据控件。The code-behind file loads test data and binds that data to a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts.aspx.vb#2)] 中的声明性语法控件时，使用方法替换`Container.DataItem`为`container`参数。In the declarative syntax for the control, you use the method with `Container.DataItem` for the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts3.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts3.aspx#3)] 也可以调用`Eval`函数并不包括`container`参数。Or, you can call `Eval` function and not include the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts4.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts4.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 检索对象的已声明数据项。

span.span: Retrieves an object's declared data item.

Public Shared Function GetDataItem (container As Object) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetDataItem(System::Object ^ container);

param.name: container
param.span: 表达式根据其进行计算的对象引用。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 此标识符必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

summary.span: 检索对象的已声明数据项。

span.span: Retrieves an object's declared data item.

returns.span: 表示容器的已声明数据项的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the container's declared data item.

returns.span: 如果未找到数据项或者容器的计算结果为 ，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if no data item is found or if the container evaluates to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用方法，忽略其`foundDataItem`参数返回结果时。This method calls the method, ignoring its `foundDataItem` parameter when returning the result. 在两种方式之一中标识对象的数据项。An object's data item is identified in one of two ways. 如果容器对象实现接口，属性标识的数据项，并返回其值。If the container object implements the interface, the property identifies the data item, and its value is returned. 否则，该方法会尝试以解决并返回名为"DataItem"的容器属性。Otherwise, the method attempts to resolve and return a container property named "DataItem".

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetDataItem (object container, out bool foundDataItem);
.method public static hidebysig object GetDataItem(object container, [out] bool& foundDataItem) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataItem (container As Object, ByRef foundDataItem As Boolean) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetDataItem(System::Object ^ container, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % foundDataItem);

param.name: container
param.span: 表达式根据其进行计算的对象引用。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 此标识符必须是以页的指定语言表示的有效对象标识符。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: foundDataItem
param.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否已成功解析并返回数据项。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the data item was successfully resolved and returned.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 检索对象的已声明数据项，以指示成功或失败。

span.span: Retrieves an object's declared data item, indicating success or failure.

returns.span: 表示容器的已声明数据项的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the container's declared data item.

returns.span: 如果未找到数据项或者容器的计算结果为 ，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if no data item is found or if the container evaluates to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的数据项标识两种方法。An object's data item is identified two ways. 如果容器对象实现接口，属性标识的数据项，并返回。If the container object implements the interface, the property identifies the data item, and is returned. 否则，该方法会尝试以解决并返回名为"DataItem"的容器属性。Otherwise, the method attempts to resolve and return a container property named "DataItem".

span.span: Retrieves the value of an indexed property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法，然后使用方法以设置中指定结果的格式`format`参数。The method invokes the method, and then uses the method to format the result as specified in the `format` parameter. .NET Framework 格式字符串 (如使用的那些) 将转换实例返回的数据绑定表达式对象。A .NET Framework format string (like those used by ) converts the instance returned by the data-binding expression to a object. 对于引发的异常方法适用于以及方法。Exceptions that are thrown for the method apply to the method as well. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以声明方式将绑定到索引值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method declaratively to bind to an indexed value.
